title: Streaming sucks now: Ads, bundles, price
description: With higher prices, more ads, and unwanted bundling it really seems like streaming is becoming dangerously like cable. Last year alone, all of the major names in streaming  Netflix, Hulu, Disney Plus, Max, Apple TV Plus, Paramount Plus, and Peacock  have raised their prices. This all leads to one big question: is there an end in sight to this streaming hellscape? #Technology #TV #Streaming   00:00 My Netflix 00:46  How We Got Here 2:54  An Ad Business 5:34  Bundling 6:37 Is There Hope?
